name: Majellan and the Fountain of Youth
name_original: Majellan and the Fountain of Youth
description:
evolve your jelly as you explore the wonderful world. watch out for hazards!

Over time Majellan will grow in age and gain a new way to traverse the map. The jellies youth can be maintained by collecting the blue whirlpool “fountains”.

Controls:

  • Movement: Arrow Keys + WASD
  • Jump: Up Arrow / Space

Pickups:

  • Yellow Diamond (currency)
  • Fountain (will return Majellan to a previous evolution)

End Game Condition:

  • Run out of health
  • Old age (blob -> jelli -> jellyfish)

Changelog
-----
v1.1.1 - Ludum Dare 50 submission

UI Updates:

  • completed stat tracking
    • 99 levels for max health + fountain, 10 levels for jump/float
  • delete all stats button

Game:

  • random Enchanter track on game start
  • heal flash on fountain drink
  • fix stuck / inaccessable bugs

-----

v0.9.0 - Ludum Dare 50 beta

Release Majellan and the Fountain of Youth

  • Custom Jellyfish Art + Animation (3 stages)
  • Character Floating Combat Text
  • Original Soundtrack (managed using FMOD)
  • one map to explore with different subsections
  • 3 evolutions to evolve/devolve
  • diamond currency (used for upgrades)
  • lifetime stat track (deaths, diamonds, damage taken)
  • Instructions

Known Bugs:

  • Upgrade system not fully working
  • Fountain does not properly go back one evolution.
  • Some areas are inaccessible.
  • Damage taken flash red indicator a bit wonky
